item.description: We'll have two more hot and humid days today and Friday, with hazardous heat index levels for many lower elevations both days. Some PM storms will be possible both days, with best chances in the mountains. Some widespread showers and storms are expected Saturday. Some of them could contain very heavy rain and cause localized water issues, especially in urbanized areas, and a few may also contain strong winds. A few storms linger Sunday, then MUCH more comfortable just in time for Labor Day!
